snippet: The seventh-seeded American Jack Sock defeated top-seeded John Isner, 6-4, 7-6 (4), at the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.
abstract: Jack Sock defeats John Isner in men's quarterfinals at the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, RI; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: The seventh-seeded American Jack Sock defeated top-seeded John Isner, 6-4, 7-6 (4), at the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.
